hero.name: Mikael Marceniuk
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I build scalable web solutions with Node.js, React, and TypeScript.

paragraphs.first: I specialize in building end-to-end web applications using cutting-edge technologies like React, Next.js, NestJS, and TypeScript. My approach combines clean, maintainable code with performance optimization, resulting in applications that scale efficiently and deliver exceptional user experiences.
paragraphs.second: I've helped startups reduce deployment time by 60% and enterprises improve application performance by 40% through strategic architecture decisions and modern development practices.
paragraphs.third: Currently, I'm a Senior Full-Stack Developer specializing in accessibility and performance optimization. I contribute to the creation and maintenance of scalable applications that meet modern web standards and best practices to deliver inclusive user experiences.
paragraphs.fourth: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new coffee brewing techniques â€“ precision matters in both code and coffee.

skills.title: Frontend, Backend & Full-stack development
skills.subtitle: I focus on creating maintainable, scalable solutions that grow with your business needs.

projects.title: Portfolio includes e-commerce platforms, SaaS applications, and API integrations

contact.title: Ready to collaborate? Let's build something amazing together.
contact.subtitle: I'm actively seeking full-time opportunities and freelance projects where I can contribute my technical expertise and passion for innovation. Whether you're a startup looking to build your MVP or an established company needing to scale your platform, I'm ready to help you achieve your goals.
